com.f2prateek.ln
Class LnFacade

java.lang.Object
  com.f2prateek.ln.LnFacade
All Implemented Interfaces:
LnInterface
public class LnFacade
extends Object
implements LnInterface

A facade for posting to multiple LnInterface's. Each endpoint is responsible for respecting the log level itself.

Field Summary
protected  int minimumLogLevel

Field Detail

minimumLogLevel

protected int minimumLogLevel
Constructor Detail

LnFacade

public LnFacade(LnInterface lnInterface,
                LnInterface... lnInterfaces)
Construct a LnFacade. Requires at least one endpoint. At least one instance of LnInterface is required. All instances are set to have a log level of Log.INFO.

Parameters:
lnInterface - An instance of LnInterface you want to use
lnInterfaces - Any additional instance of LnInterface you want to use.

LnFacade

public LnFacade(int logLevel,
                LnInterface lnInterface,
                LnInterface... lnInterfaces)
Allows you to specify a initial log level for all endpoints this facade should post to.

getLoggingLevel

public int getLoggingLevel()
Description copied from interface: LnInterface
Get the current logging level. Should return one of : 1. Log.VERBOSE 2. Log.ERROR 3. Log.INFO 4. Log.WARN 5. Log.ERROR 6. Log.ASSERT 7. -1 if not supported

Specified by:
getLoggingLevel in interface LnInterface

setLoggingLevel

public void setLoggingLevel(int level)
Description copied from interface: LnInterface
Set the logging level. Should be one of : 1. Log.VERBOSE 2. Log.ERROR 3. Log.INFO 4. Log.WARN 5. Log.ERROR 6. Log.ASSERT

Specified by:
setLoggingLevel in interface LnInterface
